stages.logText: Mara asked me to bring some bread to a hermit which lives south of Loneford. She warned me he was not a very pleasant man.
I brought the bread to Edwin. I should get back to Mara to receive my reward.
Mara paid me five gold for the delivery.
Edwin told me his friend Arcir needed help. I should speak with him.
Arcir told me he had been robbed a unique book: Elythara's Chants. He suspects the Shadow's Church.
Athamyr admitted he organized the burglary. The bandit is south of the crossroad to Stoutford. I should bring the book back to Arcir once I killed the bandit.
I brought the book back to Arcir. He told me to go see Edwin and tell him I helped him.

Edwin organized it all. He gave me a last task before explaining me why I had been tested. I have to find a thief that stole his ring. He should be located at the end of Elren's Mine south of Crossglen.
This was a test too. The woman had no ring and sent me back to Edwin.
Edwin told me to go downstairs to understand why I was tested two times.
I've met Elythara herself and she told me her story. I agreed to help her recovering her soul so she can rise again.
Edwin suspects that one of the soul part, the helmet, is in a sanctuary under Flagstone Prison.
The old man asked me to bring his ring to his wife which lives in Fallhaven. When I'll come back he'll give me the helmet.
I found his wife and she gave a loaf of bread and her ring to give him.
The old man died happily after receiving his wife's ring and bread. Now I have the helmet. I should bring it to Edwin.
I brought the helmet to Edwin. He'll keep the soul parts for me.
Arcir thinks that one of the soul parts should be in the tomb under Fallhaven's Church.
I brought the sword to Edwin. He'll keep the soul parts for me.

I asked Arcir if he had any ideas where the last soul part could be. He said I should ask the Shadow's Priests if they knew anything about old Shadow's sanctuaries faking I'm a historian writing a book about the cult of the Shadow.
The priest of Loneford only knew about the Flagstone's sanctuary.
The priest of Fallhaven spoke to me about a sanctuary somewhere south of Fallhaven.
The priest of Vilegard talked about a sanctuary on the Duleain Road north of the huntsman's house. I should go investigate there.
I brought the shield back to Edwin. He'll keep the soul parts for me.
Edwin now has all the soul parts now. He has to prepare the ritual to give her soul back to Elythara.
Helmet
Shield
Sword
All of them.
